Description: Fragment of yellow wool cloth partly covered with rows of long loops in matching yellow yarn; warp-yellow wool (S/c.9), weft- yellow wool (S/paired/c.10 sheds per cm); pile yarn paired threads; edges cut or ragged; pile yarn floats over 4-6 warp ends back under the 6th and 4th (or 4th and 2nd) of these, extending out into a loop (c.11cm long), back under the same threads then floating again; lines of pile c.1.5 cm apart; probably from a mattress cover
Curator's comments: Unreg 70. Previously in grey plan chest in Student's Room; kept with small bag with an extra loop
